title: Moroso 62515 Motor Mount for Chevy
features: Manufactured from .188" thick zinc plated steel
Eliminates torque loss and binding linkages
Inside base width: 2- 3/8", Base to mounting bolt hole: 2- 1/2"
Eliminates the need for bulky torque straps
description: Moroso solid steel motor mount replaces stock, OEM-style rubber mounts. These mounts eliminate torque loss and binding linkages, a common result of excessive engine movement. Finished with a protective zinc coating.
